## Source: amazon-inspector (b41154fc2678ab5be471f8ef4eb2065a74e9310ea81b5d3f3fd8617a1e880d67)
The package baidu-src-test3 was found to contain malicious code.

## Source: ossf-package-analysis (e50d8f616942eb8beb76f6019780078fb1bc2d6219cc6128c56e311bc5d77a83)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'baidu-src-test3' @ 0.0.4 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
